campaigns.subject: New Product Launch - Don't Miss Out!
campaigns.content: Hi there! We're excited to announce our latest product launch. Check it out at https://company.com/new-product and get 20% off with code LAUNCH20. Visit our blog at https://company.com/blog for more details.

campaigns.subject: Weekly Newsletter #42
campaigns.content: This week's highlights include new features, customer stories, and upcoming events. Stay connected with us at https://company.com/newsletter for weekly updates.
